title: Apple’s folding iPhone could automatically shut to protect itself from fumble fingers
description: Apple may be looking at reinventing the hinge by not having one to better protect the foldable phone's screens.

title: Hard disk drives could finally be out by Christmas if this trend continues
description: The average price of SSD building blocks is falling down and it’s good news

title: The Google Pixel Fold could be the phone that makes foldables affordable
description: Google's Pixel Fold could herald cheaper foldables when it launches at Google I/O in May, a new report claims.
